name: Pony Friends 2
description:
Welcome back to the stables with Pony Friends™ 2. Pony Friends 2 allows players the chance to create their perfect Pony and take part in fun activities. Featuring 12 Pony breeds (4 new breeds) players can customise every aspect of its appearance, along with its own unique

personality. Players can choose all their Pony’s accessories and even design some of their own.

Taking special care of their Pony to keep it clean and healthy, players can take it on trail rides across different landscapes and environments. Grab the reins, photograph wildlife and unlock a whole host of secrets on your journey.

Pony Friends 2 features an exciting and energetic competitive mode: players can compete in races and trick competitions alone or with a friend.

Players can trade ponies and even talk to their Ponies.

Features

• Race, compete and trade with your friends. Enter race and trick competitions and win lots of trophies. Experience multiplayer racing and trick competitions!
• Explore 25 diverse trails, befriend wild ponies and photograph wildlife to discover secrets. Take the reins and ride your pony on a range of trails and through open areas, alone or with a friend.
• Photograph many different wild animals and earn the friendship of wild ponies.
• Earn new accessories and create a special look for your Pony. Choose and personalize your ponies and everything else to just how you like it!
• Groom and take care of your Pony to keep it clean and happy.
• Discover the Pony Friends world and get to know your ponies at your own pace.There is always something new to explore.
• Talk to your pony; watch how it responds to your voice!
